text.section: To apply for financial assistance from the Fund under § 5-525 of this subtitle, an applicant shall submit to the Authority an application on the form that the Authority provides.
The Authority may require an applicant to provide an audited balance sheet before the Authority approves or denies the application.

The Authority may delegate the review and approval of the application information required under subsection (b)(1), (2), and (3) of this section to the Executive Director if an applicant meets all other requirements of this section.
